title: 04/27/2021 - HOUR 1 - Mac Jones, Niners, Brady
itunes:title: 04/27/2021 - HOUR 1 - Mac Jones, Niners, Brady
description:
If the 49ers draft Mac Jones it's because of fear

Look for the Niners to trade Jimmy G soon

Tom Brady takes care of his body and is always restructuring his contract


Guest: Peter King

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
